row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION# = '' :IF &UC4RB_AWS_IP# = "" : IF &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOC_ID# = "" : PRINT One of IP Address or Allocation ID must be non-empty : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION# = '-a &UC4RB_AWS_ALLOC_ID#' : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION# = '&UC4RB_AWS_IP#' :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
echo 'Disassociating Elastic IP address..'
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-disassociate-address &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_ADDRESS_OPTION#
ret=$? if [ "$ret" -gt "0" ]; then echo Failed to disassociate address. exit $ret fi
echo Successfully disassociate address.
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process: :SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "ADDRESS*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 8, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 9) : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_OUT_IP# = STR_TRIM(&output_line#) : PRINT Elastic IP address = &UC4RB_OUT_IP# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_IP#, , "WORKFLOW" :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
